languages.text: "Мы воспользовались иными методами перемещения, чтобы нанести вам визит". {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас с непроницаемым видом.{/n} "Заверяю, Вольный Торговец, что все ваши запоры и замки в полном порядке".

traits.locale_text: "Мы воспользовались иными методами перемещения, чтобы нанести вам визит". {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас с непроницаемым видом.{/n} "Заверяю, Вольный Торговец, что все ваши запоры и замки в полном порядке".

languages.text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."
languages.original_text: "Мы воспользовались иными методами перемещения, чтобы нанести вам визит". {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас с непроницаемым видом.{/n} "Заверяю, Вольный Торговец, что все ваши запоры и замки в полном порядке".

traits.locale_text: "We used other means of transport to pay you a visit." {n}Heinrix gazes at you with an impenetrable expression.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all of your locks are in order."
"We used other means of transport to pay you a visit." {n}Heinrix gazes at you with an impenetrable expression.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all of your locks are in order."
"We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

"We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

languages.text: 「今回の訪問は別の手段をとった」{n}ハインリックスの視線がこちらにじっと注がれる。その表情は硬い。{/n}「安心してくれ、自由開拓者、どの鍵も壊れてはいない」
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: 「今回の訪問は別の手段をとった」{n}ハインリックスの視線がこちらにじっと注がれる。その表情は硬い。{/n}「安心してくれ、自由開拓者、どの鍵も壊れてはいない」

languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

languages.text: “并没有硬闯。” {n}海因里希盯着你，露出一副高深莫测的表情。{/n}“我向你保证，行商浪人，你的门锁完好无损。”
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: “并没有硬闯。” {n}海因里希盯着你，露出一副高深莫测的表情。{/n}“我向你保证，行商浪人，你的门锁完好无损。”

languages.text: «Usamos otros medios de transporte para hacerle esta visita». {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente con gesto inescrutable.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, le aseguro que sus cerraduras funcionan perfectamente».
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: «Usamos otros medios de transporte para hacerle esta visita». {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente con gesto inescrutable.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, le aseguro que sus cerraduras funcionan perfectamente».

languages.text: « Nous sommes entrés par un autre moyen, {n}rétorque Heinrix en vous fixant d'un regard impassible.{/n} Je peux vous assurer que vos serrures sont intactes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes entrés par un autre moyen, {n}rétorque Heinrix en vous fixant d'un regard impassible.{/n} Je peux vous assurer que vos serrures sont intactes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Wir haben uns für diesen Besuch einer anderen Reisemethode bedient." {n}Heinrix' Blick durchbohrt dich, sein Ausdruck ist undurchdringlich.{/n} "Ich versichere Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, alle Eure Schlösser sind unversehrt."
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben uns für diesen Besuch einer anderen Reisemethode bedient." {n}Heinrix' Blick durchbohrt dich, sein Ausdruck ist undurchdringlich.{/n} "Ich versichere Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, alle Eure Schlösser sind unversehrt."

languages.text: "Ziyarete gelirken farklı yöntemler kullandık." {n}Heinrix'in bakışları seni delip geçiyor, yüz ifadesinden hiçbir şey okunamıyor.{/n} "Seni temin ederim Hür Tacir, tüm kilitlerin gayet sağlam durumda."
languages.original_text: "We used other means of travel to pay you this visit." {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into you, his expression impenetrable.{/n} "I assure you, Rogue Trader, that all your locks are in order."

traits.locale_text: "Ziyarete gelirken farklı yöntemler kullandık." {n}Heinrix'in bakışları seni delip geçiyor, yüz ifadesinden hiçbir şey okunamıyor.{/n} "Seni temin ederim Hür Tacir, tüm kilitlerin gayet sağlam durumda."
